attributes.attribute: A popular mid-range pop-up with self locating ‘smart’ magnetic locking arms, magnetic bars and clip-on graphic hanger fittings. Graphic kit includes frame, mag bars, hangers and kickers (for one sided graphic only)

<FONT color=#ff0000>Please note that the 5% price freeze is for the&nbsp;3x2, 3x3 and 3x4 curved only</FONT>;Quality anodised finish;Self-locating 'smart' magnetic locking arms and low profile mag bars;Available as frame only or graphic hanging kit;Option for graphics to be displayed on both sides;All front curve / D-end panels are the same size;D-end graphic panels also fit the Quick Tower;Smaller graphic size 'Midi' version available, please <A class="" href="https://secure.sitesphere.net/users/ULTIMA/files/User Instructions/PopUps/Evolution Midi pop-up data sheet Rev 3.pdf" target=_blank>click here</A> for the data sheet;Available in a combination of quad sizes from 1 x 1 desktop to 5 x 5 freestanding exhibition displays;3 quad graphic height 2225mm approx;3 quad midi graphic height 1850mm approx;Fabric pop-up panels are also available;Accessories include choice of Lighting and Transit cases;<STRONG>3 x 4 and 3 x 3 Straight Kits are Made To Order items </STRONG>;<STRONG>Please note that 3 x 2, 3 x 3 and 3 x 4 curved configurations and the 3 x 4 straight are Off the Shelf items</STRONG>
A high tech lightweight pop-up with all the features of the Xpress, the pop-up frame is constructed in a cross braced format for extra rigidity and stability on uneven surfaces

<FONT color=#ff0000>Please note that the 5% price freeze is for the 3x4 curved only</FONT>;Small 8mm tube frame with high tech styling;Quality anodised aluminium finish;Tallest pop-up in the range;Narrow footprint for use in more compact spaces;Enhanced graphic support;Option for graphics to be displayed on both sides;(Graphic kit includes frame, mag bars, hangers and kickers (for one sided graphic only)
An exciting pop-up tower that is simplicity itself to assemble and provides maximum impact to any display. <font color="#ff0000">NB the Xpress version of the Tower is no longer available.</font>

Graphic kit includes frame, mag bars and hangers;Panel widths are the same as the D-end front curve of the Quick (673mm wide); Available in 2,3,4 and 5 Quads High; Graphic Heights (mm): 2 Quad - 1495, 3 Quad -2225, 4 Quad -2968, 5 Quad - 3710;Compact for easy storage;Plum powdercoated finish;Overall diameter 640mm;Tower can be internally illuminated (full 360 degrees) using 9 x Powerspot 1200 lights (see recommended accessories);<EM>For external lighting, please specify pole fittings on the lights and additional moulded node fittings for the tower (see recommended accessories);Suitable external lights: PS500,600,900 and PS1000</EM>
Fully magnetic, with silver anodised aluminium frame and saffron components, Evolution Xpress is stylish and very simple to use.

<FONT color=#ff0000>Please note that the 5% price freeze is for the 3x3 curved and the 3x4 curved only</FONT>;Self-locating hanging system with magnetic hangers make it the simplest pop-up to assemble;Self-locating 'smart' magnetic locking arms and low profile mag bars;Quality anodised aluminium finish;Option for graphics to be displayed on both sides;All front curve / D-end panels are the same size;D-end graphic panels also fit the Xpress Tower;Available in a combination of quads from 1 x 1 desktop to 5 x 5 freestanding exhibition display;Graphic kit includes frame, mag bars, hangers and kickers (for one sided graphic only);<STRONG>Please note that 3 x 3 and 3 x 4 curved configurations are Off the Shelf items</STRONG>
Tension fabric systems are the next generation in large format graphic displays. These lightweight systems are highly portable and easy to set up, offering maximum impact with minimal fuss.
Available in 3 x 2, 3 x 3 and 3 x 4 quads;Comes complete with carry bag;NB - fabric graphics not included
